column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////Wow.  People have raved about Wildberry to me for well over a year now
column2: and I finally made the visit on Sunday morning
column3: waited the hour and a half for a table
column4: and have to say the meal was delicious.  First and foremost
column5: be prepared to wait.  Do NOT wait until you are at the point of starvation before going to Wildberry.  Make sure you arrive a solid hour to 90 minutes before you will be at your "drop dead of hunger" point and put your name in.  There are plenty of sights nearby to entertain yourself while you're waiting - go for a walk along the lake
column7: go hit up some stores on State Street.
